concept.title: View Contents of Error Report Files
concept.shortdesc: Generally, the software generates four error reporting files, individually named as *.ZCR, *.DMP, *.REG and the crashed drawing file itself. In this error report dialog box, you can see the contents of error reports by clicking on the "Click here" link. You can optionally select a file in the "Error Report Contents" dialog box, or double-clicka file to view its contents.
